product_description: J.VER Mens Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Regular Fit Casual Button Down Shirt Elastic✔ When you have an interview or first day to work, decent dress shirt can provide you professional personal image✔ As a lady/women, when you want to prepare a gift for your hasband/friend/father, the shirt can be a good choice.✔ The pattern on the neckline, placket and cuffs make the shirt eye-catching.Attending a party or wedding, this is an essential fashion shirt.✔ Moments when you experience success, happiness and satisfaction. A truly unique sensation. Start to share the feeling by wearing this dress shirts.All the above situation, J.VER Dress Shirt can meet your need.● J.VER is committed to produce the most fitted men's wear with superb technology, high quality fabrics, a variety of styles.● J.VER represents uncompromising quality with regard to materials and finishing, outstanding wear and care advantages, an excellent value for money.● All the material is non-toxic and environmental, which can prevent skin allergic or other skin problems caused by original materials.About Size:J.VER Men's Long Sleeve Shirts are designed with US size with extra comfortable cut.The dress shirts is Regular Fit which means cut broader across the shoulders and relaxed through the chest and body.Apply Occasion:Official/business formal occasions, conferences,party,weddings, dances, daily Work Reminder:The actual color may be slightly different with the picture is due to a variety of different brightness of the display causedWashing Instructions:1. The maximum washing temperature is 30 degrees Celsius, and the soaking time should not exceed 15 minutes.2. Do not bleach, use a neutral detergent with a bright white effect.3. Wash it separately from dark clothes and wool fabrics during washing, to avoid staining and stickiness.4. Hang in the shade to dry.
